title: Charter Internet Network Latency
body: Just wanted to add to all the other topics that League has become unplayable for me.  I randomly get spikes in ping that last for several minutes at a time.  I have Charter internet service in Tennessee.  If someone from Riot can see this, I would appreciate if it could be checked out.  I think a lot of players are experiencing these issues with Charter currently.  Thanks.

replies.body:
I've seen a few reports related to ISP issues, and we'd like to continue looking into this.  As a first step, I ask that you first try our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  This because while symptoms might be similar, it doesn't mean that the issue is the same for everyone.  

If that doesn't fix things up, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a deeper look.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get some logs to review.  We will respond as soon as we can!
I have charter too and am experiencing this.
